channel.title: Special Attack
channel.description:
Does anyone have a tutorial for adding special attacks. I'd like to add specials to my server. Anyone got one. I'd tried looking around and I used the search button, but the new search button isn't as good as it used to be. Anyone?
Many Thanks,
Syrillia.

item.title: Special Attack
item.dc:creator: @darkman210 darkman210
item.description:
@darkman210 wrote:

Try adding this to your client.java

public void frame70(int i1, int i2, int i3) // interface thing, not sure
{
outStream.createFrame(70); // THIS FRAME IS FOR SPECIAL ATTACK BAR MOFOS!
outStream.writeWord(i1); // offset X
outStream.writeWordBigEndian(i2); // offset Y
outStream.writeWordBigEndian(i3); // interface, definatly.
sendMessage(“Frame 70 tested”);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

I don’t know if it will help or not. But why not give it a shot eh?
Tell me how it goes.

Read full topic
